desc: This method is used to create a channel.

errors.name_taken: A channel cannot be created with the given name.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the authenticated user from creating channels.
errors.no_channel: Value passed for name was empty.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
errors.user_is_restricted: This method cannot be called by a restricted user or single channel guest.
